{{Infobox dungeon |name = Whirl Islands |image = [[File:Whirl Islands.png|300px]] |caption = An inside view of Whirl Islands. |tokens = 5,000 |location = On Route 41, south of Olivine City. }} '''Whirl Islands''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. ==Dungeon Stats== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !!
